room_title: Escape room "Wild Wild West" by LI Escape Game in Riverhead
room_description: Your criminal ways have finally caught up with you. You’ve been arrested and are awaiting trial when you overhear the sheriff talking about a recent wagon heist. The Soapy Smith Gang robbed a shipment coming back from the gold rush, and they’ve hidden their loot in the local saloon. Use your criminal wits to bust out of jail and grab the loot before the gang rides back into town in 60 min to claim it back.
